sentences.english: Currently, the development of wind energy resources in Dongying City is mainly embodied in wind power generation.
sentences.chinese: 目前東營市風能資源的發展主要體現在風力發電上。

sentences.english: 'Not on the highest setting or you might burn up the leather, ' he notes.
sentences.chinese: 他說，不要把風力開到最高檔，否則可能會燙傷皮面。

sentences.english: Chinese wind-turbine makers are starting to export.
sentences.chinese: 中國的風力渦輪機開始進行出口。

sentences.english: The Dynamic Simulation models of typical controlled processes of wind turbine are established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了風力發電機組典型受控過程的動態仿真模型。

sentences.english: The event was cancelled due to the weak wind.
sentences.chinese: 因風力太弱該次賽事取消。

sentences.english: Denmark is home to the world's largest wind turbine manufacturer, Vestas.
sentences.chinese: 丹麥是世界最大風力渦輪機制造商維斯塔斯的家鄉。

sentences.english: A wind turbine has a life span of at least 25 years.
sentences.chinese: 風力透平的壽命至少是25年。

sentences.english: The results of the analysis is a reference for wind turbine blade loads research.
sentences.chinese: 分析結果可爲風力機葉片載荷研究做參考。

sentences.english: It provides convenience for the dynamic performance analysis of wind turbine in the turbulent wind field.
sentences.chinese: 爲風力機在紊流風場作用下的性能分析提供了條件。

sentences.english: Mills used to depend on wind power or water power.
sentences.chinese: 磨坊過去依賴風力或水力操作。

sentences.english: The energy in the wind turns two or three propeller-like blades around a rotor.
sentences.chinese: 風力推動固定在轉軸上兩三個像推進器一樣的葉片。

sentences.english: A new plan of wind-power water-pumping system is put forward in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一種新的風力發電泵水系統方案。

sentences.english: The windmill designed by this scheme has various advanta…
sentences.chinese: 用該方案所設計的風力機具有多種優越性。

sentences.english: The invention relates to an auto on-off loose-leaf wind power machine which can gather energy to increase the speed.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及一種聚能增速自動開合活葉式風力機。

sentences.english: This would have effects on wind and rain in the weather picture.
sentences.chinese: 這將在氣象雲圖上表現爲對風力和降雨的影響。

definition: dry land (as opposed to the sea)
